title: Magic Announces Distribution of Cash Dividend for Second Half of 2017
text:
OR YEHUDA, Israel, February 28, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
Magic Software Enterprises Ltd . (NASDAQ and TASE: MGIC), a global provider of end-to-end integration and application development solutions and IT consulting services, announced today that in compliance with its dividend distribution policy, its Board of Directors has declared a semi-annual cash dividend in the amount of US $0.13 per share and in the aggregate amount of approximately US $5.8 million for the second half of 2017, reflecting 75% of its net income attributable to Magic's shareholders.
The dividend is payable on March 26, 2018 to all of the Company's shareholders of record at the close of the NASDAQ Global Select Market on March 13, 2018.
Together with the dividend distributed for the first half of 2017, Magic distributed an annual total of US $0.26 per share related to its 2017 earnings and in the aggregate amount of approximately US $11.6 million.
In accordance with Israeli tax law, the dividend is subject to withholding tax at source at the rate of 30% (if the recipient of the dividend is at the time of distribution or was at any time during the preceding 12-month period the holder of 10% or more of the Company's share capital) or 25% (for all other dividend recipients) of the dividend amount payable to each shareholder of record, subject to applicable exemptions.
The dividend will be paid in US dollars on the ordinary shares of Magic Software Enterprises that are traded both on the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange and the NASDAQ Global Select Market.
